title: Firearms News Vol.70 No.3
description:
English | 172 pages | PDF | 111.8 Mb




Each issue contains reviews of guns and popular gun accessories, articles about the history of firearms, and columns written by gun owners about their experiences. The magazine also contains informative advertisements for gun manufacturers. Shotgun News is known mainly for its extensive firearm reviews. Each issue offers a front-cover, featured review of a firearm that is either new or growing in popularity. All types of firearms have been featured, including handguns, rifles, and automatic weapons. Shotgun News also provides reviews of firearm accessories and upgrades. Readers consult the magazine before buying accessories like triggers, silencers, and scopes for their weapons
